Description.p: The core of the scheduling system, that assigns a particular ScheduleAcademicDay and SchedulePeriodTime to the set of calendar dates covered by a particular Schedule.

Each entry in the CalendaDateList determines WHICH meetings will occur on that date (via the ScheduleAcademicDay) and WHEN those meetings will take place (via the SchedulePeriodTime), as well as which ScheduleTerms are in session on that particular CalendarDate
Could be thought of as a member of Schedule data object; but it has been extracted as a separate object, without identifiers, to make it easier to build API endpoint definitions
The provider, e.g. school, tertiary institution etc, that this schedule date record belongs to.
The schedule within the provider to which this ScheduleDate applies.
A list of schedule calendar dates and the period times, academic day and terms that applies to each day.
The audit details for a record, e.g. Created/Last Updated DateTime and Created/Last Updated By.
